resources.string: Application "Rockstar" is committed to providing users a sense of the game on a real e-guitar. RokStar feigns the neck of the guitar with a recorded sound from real electric guitar, the idea is of using the smartphone as a real guitars neck.
Changing this value allow you to configure number of bar\'s what you can see on your display.
This setting allow you to configure how many sound channels can play in one time.
